overview: JR Productions is proud to present Ticket Zer0 - a feature length horror from the makers of the Clear Skies trilogy.  It's nightshift at a deserted industrial estate.  A troubleshooter is sent in to fix a mysterious long term problem, but the cause is far more sinister than any of them could have imagined.  If you're on nightshift tonight, your number's up...
title: Ticket Zer0
